type CustomLineCap = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface ICloneable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 封装自定义的用户定义的线帽。

span.span: Encapsulates a custom user-defined line cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用线帽的起始和结束的直线或曲线绘制的 GDI +对象。Line caps are used at the beginnings and ends of lines or curves drawn by GDI+ objects. GDI + 支持几种预定义的线帽样式，并且还允许用户定义其自己的线帽样式。GDI+ supports several predefined cap styles, and also allows users to define their own cap styles. 此类用于创建自定义线帽样式。This class is used to create custom cap styles. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example demonstrates how to use the class. 若要运行此示例粘贴到 Windows 窗体的代码。To run this example paste, the code into a Windows Form. 处理该窗体事件，并调用`DrawCaps`从窗体的事件处理方法，传递`e`作为。Handle the form's event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的轮廓和填充初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified outline and fill.

summary.span: 使用指定的轮廓和填充初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified outline and fill.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用"绕组"的填充模式，而不考虑为操作指定的填充模式。 uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation. `fillPath`和`strokePath`不能在同一时间使用参数。The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time. 必须将一个参数传递 null 值。One parameter must be passed a null value. 如果任一参数传递 null 值，`fillPath`将被忽略。If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored. 如果`strokePath`是`null`，`fillPath`应截获负 y 轴。If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 若要运行此示例中，将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form. 处理该窗体事件，并调用`DrawCaps`从窗体的事件处理方法，传递`e`作为。Handle the form's event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc3/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用"绕组"的填充模式，而不考虑为操作指定的填充模式。 uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation. `fillPath`和`strokePath`不能在同一时间使用参数。The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time. 必须将一个参数传递 null 值。One parameter must be passed a null value. 如果任一参数传递 null 值，`fillPath`将被忽略。If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored. 如果`strokePath`是`null`，`fillPath`应截获负 y 轴。If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用"绕组"的填充模式，而不考虑为操作指定的填充模式。 uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation. `fillPath`和`strokePath`不能在同一时间使用参数。The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time. 必须将一个参数传递 null 值。One parameter must be passed a null value. 如果任一参数传递 null 值，`fillPath`将被忽略。If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored. 如果`strokePath`是`null`，`fillPath`应截获负 y 轴。If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定可用于联接直线和曲线构成的笔画的路径的枚举对象。This property specifies a enumeration that is used to join lines and curves that make up the stroked path of this object.

summary.span: 获取或设置相对于 对象的宽度此 类对象的缩放量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount by which to scale this Class object with respect to the width of the object.
The amount by which to scale the cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的钢笔的宽度要乘以的自定义线帽大小的倍数。This property specifies the multiple of the pen width by which to multiply the size of the custom cap. 例如，如果此属性等于 1，自定义线帽的宽度为 10、 自定义线帽高度为 5，并且使用宽度为 3 笔绘制一条线，上限就是绘制 30 个单位宽、 15 个单位高。For example, if this property equals 1, the custom cap width is 10, the custom cap height is 5, and a line is drawn with a pen with a width of 3, then the cap is drawn 30 units wide and 15 units high. 将此属性设置为 3 会导致指针帽是绘制 90 个单位宽、 高 45 个单位。Setting this property to 3 causes the cap to be drawn 90 units wide and 45 units high.
